data.title: You Have to Run Fast
data.meta_description: Beverly Hills, CA: United Artists, 1961. Vintage studio still photograph of Craig Hill, Elaine Edwards, and Willis Bouchey, from the 1961 film. Dr. Frank Harlow Hill flees to another town and changes his name after witnessing a murder of a detective, taking up lodging in a remote home of the wheelchair boound Colonel Maitland Bouchey and his daughter Laurie Edwards . 8 x 10 inches. Small circle in manuscript ink over the name of
data.text:
Edward L. Cahn (director)

Orville H. Hampton (screenwriter)

Craig Hill, Elaine Edwards, Grant Richards (starring)

Beverly Hills, CA: United Artists, 1961. Vintage studio still photograph of Craig Hill, Elaine Edwards, and Willis Bouchey, from the 1961 film.

Dr. Frank Harlow (Hill) flees to another town and changes his name after witnessing a murder of a detective, taking up lodging in a remote home of the wheelchair boound Colonel Maitland (Bouchey) and his daughter Laurie (Edwards).

8 x 10 inches. Small circle in manuscript ink over the name of Craig Hill on text in margin, otherwise Near Fine.

[Book #148075]
